00057     protected function makeMapArray( $apiName, $subApiName = null, array $apiMap, $setRequestMap = true )
00058     {
00059         $_parameters = array();
00060 
00061         foreach ( $apiMap as $_key => $_value )
00062         {
00063             $_mapItem = $this->makeMapItem(
00064                 ( in_array( 'label', $_value ) ) ? $_value[ 'name' ] : $_value[ 'label' ],
00065                 $_value[ 'name' ],
00066                 ( in_array( 'required', $_value ) ) ? $_value[ 'required' ] : false,
00067                 ( in_array( 'options', $_value ) ) ? $_value[ 'options' ] : null
00068             );
00069 
00070             $_mapItem = ( $subApiName != null ) ? array( $subApiName => $_mapItem ) : array( $_key, $_mapItem );
00071 
00072             if ( $setRequestMap )
00073                 $this->requestMap[ $apiName ] = $_mapItem;
00074 
00075             array_merge( $_parameters[ $apiName ], $_mapItem );
00076         }
00077 
00078         return( $_parameters );
00079     }

00091     protected function makeMapItem( $itemLabel, $parameterName = null, $required = false, $options = array(), array &$target = null )
00092     {
00093         //  Build default settings
00094         $_mappingOptions = array(
00095             'name' => ( null != $parameterName ) ? $parameterName : $itemLabel,
00096             'required' => $required
00097         );
00098 
00099         //  Add on supplied options
00100         if ( ! empty( $options ) )
00101             $_mappingOptions = array_merge( $_mappingOptions, $options );
00102 
00103         //  Insert for caller if requested
00104         if ( null != $target )
00105             $target[ $itemLabel ] = $_mappingOptions;
00106 
00107         //  Return our array
00108         return( $_mappingOptions );
00109     }
